00007 
00008 #ifndef BOOST_IOSTREAMS_COUNTER_HPP_INCLUDED
00009 #define BOOST_IOSTREAMS_COUNTER_HPP_INCLUDED
00010 
00011 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00012 # pragma once
00013 #endif
00014 
00015 #include <algorithm>  // count.
00016 #include <boost/iostreams/categories.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/iostreams/char_traits.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/iostreams/operations.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/iostreams/pipeline.hpp>
00020 
00021 // Must come last.
00022 #include <boost/iostreams/detail/config/disable_warnings.hpp> // VC7.1 C4244.
00023 
00024 namespace boost { namespace iostreams {
00025 
00026 //
00027 // Template name: basic_counter.
00028 // Template paramters:
00029 //      Ch - The character type.
00030 // Description: Filter which counts lines and characters.
00031 //
00032 
00033 template<typename Ch>
00034 class basic_error_finder  {
00035 public:
00036   
00037     typedef Ch char_type;
00038     struct category
00039         : dual_use,
00040           filter_tag,
00041           multichar_tag,
00042           optimally_buffered_tag
00043         { };
00044     explicit basic_error_finder(int first_line = 0, int first_char = 0)
00045         : lines_(first_line), chars_(first_char)
00046         { }
00047 
00048 #ifdef GET_STRING         
00049     std::string current_line_;
00050     std::string current_line_prev;
00051 #endif
00052     int lines_prev;
00053     int chars_prev;
00054           
00055     int lines() const { return lines_; }
00056     int characters() const { return chars_; }
00057     std::streamsize optimal_buffer_size() const { return 0; }
00058 
00059     template<typename Source>
00060     std::streamsize read(Source& src, char_type* s, std::streamsize n)
00061     {
00062 #ifdef GET_STRING
00063       current_line_prev = current_line_;
00064 #endif
00065       chars_prev = chars_;
00066       lines_prev = lines_;
00067       
00068         std::streamsize result = iostreams::read(src, s, n);
00069         if (result == -1)
00070             return -1;
00071         
00072         int newline_count = std::count(s, s + result, char_traits<Ch>::newline());
00073         lines_ += newline_count;
00074         if(newline_count == 0)
00075         {
00076           chars_ += result;
00077 #ifdef GET_STRING
00078           current_line_ += std::string(s, result);
00079 #endif
00080         }
00081         else
00082         {
00083           int last_newline = 0;
00084           for(int i = 1; i < result; ++i)
00085           {
00086             if(*(s + i) == char_traits<Ch>::newline())
00087               last_newline = i;
00088           }
00089           chars_ = result - (last_newline + 1);
00090 #ifdef GET_STRING
00091           current_line_ = std::string(s + last_newline + 1, chars_);
00092 #endif
00093         }
00094         return result;
00095     }
00096     
00097     template<typename Sink>
00098     std::streamsize write(Sink& snk, const char_type* s, std::streamsize n)
00099     {
00100         std::streamsize result = iostreams::write(snk, s, n);
00101         lines_ += std::count(s, s + result, char_traits<Ch>::newline());
00102         chars_ += result;
00103         return result;
00104     }
00105     
00106 private:
00107     int lines_;
00108  
00109     int chars_;
00110 
00111 };
00112 BOOST_IOSTREAMS_PIPABLE(basic_error_finder, 1)
00113 
00114 
00115 typedef basic_error_finder<char>     error_counter;
00116 typedef basic_error_finder<wchar_t>  werror_counter;
00117 
00118 } } // End namespaces iostreams, boost.
00119 
00120 #include <boost/iostreams/detail/config/enable_warnings.hpp>
00121 
00122 #endif // #ifndef BOOST_IOSTREAMS_COUNTER_HPP_INCLUDED
